item.title: Holy Sh!it We're Alive - Doug Cartwright (Book)
item.description: Holy Sh!it We’re Alive - Doug Cartwright (Book) Book summary Why? How do I benefit my self with this book? I think that this book will help me to appreciate things of life and begin to start living a fulfilling life

item.title: How to Win Friends and Influence People (Book)
item.description: How to Win Friends and Influence People (Book) Book summary [!seealso] Book in 100 seconds Fundamental techniques: Don’t criticise or complain Give genuine admiration Think in what the other person wants and help them to reach their goals Six ways to make people like you Give genuine interest in what the other person has done or wants to do Give a good first impression by smiling when you see someone Call the people by their names and remember important things about them - make them feel important Why?
